resources.string: Join a community dedicated to keeping each other safe
Send notifications to your loved ones if you feel like you are in danger
This brings people together, closer to each other.
THREE THINGS AND WE ARE DONE!
First, we need access to Bluetooth
By using Bluetooth as a background process it\'s possible to trace down your location in the event of any emergency.
We can help best during critical moments if you have someone to reach out to. Go ahead and tap the (+) button above to add someone.
This person should be the one who is more reliable and knows you well
If you feel you are safe, you have %s seconds to cancel this alarm
Long press on the sos in any case of emergency.\n\nWe will let your loved ones know that you need help. We will send them your coordinates and your information.
